attributes.action: Enforce the protection of pet type animals in European road transport.
attributes.additional_details: Every month foreign rescues are bringing around 500 dogs/cats into the UK to be re-homed. They are driven from all across Europe in 3.5 t vans nonstop into the UK. To often strange dogs and cats are forced to share cages for profit reasons. Such overcrowding ignores the existing law (EC 01/2005), increasing the risk of spreading disease, fighting about over food, sitting in their or their cage mates excrement and their overall welfare. True pets have this protection - re-homed animals not.
attributes.background:
As pet type animals are the most imported species into the UK their protection during transport should be enforced. 
Regarding rescue dogs being imported I call for the 1-human-to-5-pet type animal rule to be enforced like true pets (overcrowding) , driving hour rules etc.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be asking all EU countries to take action. 

Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
